text: Oui is a 1996 French comedy film, directed by Alexandre Jardin. ==Plot== Nine friends revisit their sex life and rather than enjoy, trying to rejoice. ==Cast== * Catherine Jacob as Nathalie * Miguel Bosé as Hugo * Chiara Caselli as Alice * Pierre Palmade as Octave * Jean-Marie Bigard as Stéphane * Daniel Russo as Polo * Dany Boon as Wilfried * Claire Keim as Marie * Roland Marchisio as Hervé * Sylvie Loeillet as Agathe * Agnès Soral * Alexandre Jardin ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:1996 comedy films Category:French comedy films
title: Oui (film)
